metadata.title: CVE-2021-40942 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In GPAC MP4Box v1.1.0, there is a heap-buffer-overflow in the function filter_parse_dyn_args function in filter_core/filter.c:1454, as demonstrated by GPAC. This can cause a denial of service (DOS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
